app.title: Personal Number Validator
app.subtitle: Calculate and verify Swedish personal numbers
app.privacyBadge: Calculation happens locally in your browser

input.label: Personal Number
input.help: Enter personal number with or without dash. Also supports coordination numbers.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
steps: Every other digit is multiplied by 2
Check digit is calculated from the sum

errors.tooShort: Personal number too short (at least 9 digits required)

testGenerator.warning: ⚠️ This is a synthetic test number, not a real person
